Package org.example

Class CRUDUtils

java.lang.Object
org.example.CRUDUtils
public class CRUDUtils extends Object
This is a class of static methods to create, read, delete and update records in the tables of database

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public static User getUser(String login, String password)
      This is a method that returns the object of the class User from the database with these values of login and password
      Parameters:
      login - This is a unique name that was entered by user to get into the app
      password - This is a not hashed password that was entered by user to get into the app
      Returns:
      the object of the class User

    • getUser

      public static User getUser(int user_id)
      This is a method that returns the object of the class User from the database with this value of user_id
      Parameters:
      user_id - the unique number of user in database
      Returns:
      returns the object of the class User

      password - - hashed password
      salt - - "salt" for hashing

      Parameters:

      fio - surname and name of customer
